alert.note: Alert for Brown (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 9:57PM CDT until April 15 at 8:42PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. .Runoff from melted snowpack will keep river flows increased. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River Above Springfield. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 930 PM CDT Friday was 22.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 17.2 feet next Friday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.5 feet on 03/22/1978. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
